title: Upload an image and verify resizing
preconditions: User is logged in and on the image upload page.
steps:
1. Click on the 'Upload Image' button.
2. Select an image file larger than 2MB from the file dialog.
3. Click 'Open' to upload the image.
4. Wait for the upload to complete.
expected: The image is uploaded successfully and resized to a maximum of 2MB without losing quality.
